crowsdurf.io.title: US Bancorp Inc
crowsdurf.io.subtitle: Information Security Specialist
crowsdurf.io.desc:
• Used Python and SQL to provide analytics and metrics from data sourced from several identity and access management tools used by the Bank.
  • Designed and implemented dynamic reporting daashboards (in Scala and NodeJS) to replace manually created CSV/Excel reports.
  • Contributed to product and security development of the Bank's implementation of Office365/Microsoft Azure.
  • Designed and implemented a NoSQL (MongoDB) solution for tracking application account metadata for all Bank applications.

reu.title: TekSystems
reu.subtitle: IT Contractor
reu.desc:
• Used Python to extract, transform and load data from SQL and flat file sources (text, CSV, JSON) into reporting tools used by executive management.
  • Contributed to a code repository of numerical experiments in Matlab
  • Conducted theoretical investigations of closed forms for Green’s functions associated with the 2-parameter family
  • Presented results at:
    • The Joint Mathematics Meetings 2013 in San Diego, CA
    • The Young Mathematicians Conference 2012 at Ohio State University; our abstract was one of 55 accepted out of 110 submitted
    • Brown's 2013 Symposium for Undergraduates in the Mathematical Sciences
  • Research funded by NSF grant DMS-1115392

penobscot.title: University of St. Thomas
penobscot.subtitle: Student Technician
penobscot.desc:
• Assisted students, faculty and staff with both hardware and software administration tasks (account resets, mail/file quotas, etc.)
  • Assisted with the desgin of SSRS/SSIS packages to present data from a SQL database tracking loanable technology assets (laptops, projectors, etc.)

paper.label: Coming soon
paper.title: A 2-Parameter Family of Kernels for Data Interpolation
paper.desc: Coauthoring a paper with my research partner from the <abbr title='Research Experience for Undergraduates'>REU</abbr> program at <abbr title='Illinois Institute of Technology'>IIT</abbr> for submission to the <abbr title='Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics'>SIAM</abbr> journal

resume.title: This Resume
resume.desc: As a way of getting familiar with the Node + CoffeeScript + Express + Jade + Less + Bootstrap stack, I built this resume page as an open-source Node app. The app renders resume content stored in a .JSON file. Check out the repo on github.

goclub.title: U.S. Bank Internship Program
goclub.subtitle: Mentor
goclub.desc:
• Helped found the Collegiate Go League, which to date has members from over 7 universities
  • Go is the ancient board game of strategy and tactics, believed to be the first board game ever invented, and as yet unconquered by computer programs
  • Raised funds and recruited new members
  • Participated in Go tournament at MIT in 2010 for the Brown University Go team
  • Received early support from the Ing Foundation, whose mission is to promote the spread of Go in Western countries

winona.title: Winona Camps
winona.subtitle: Woodworking and Riflery Counselor
winona.desc:
• Held a leadership role among the staff as one of the senior counselors
  • Taught campers (ages 11–13) skills in woodworking (designing a project, drawing a plan, carpentry techniques) and techniques of marksmanship
  • Mentored campers, encouraging their independence and helping them develop self-confidence and social skills
  • Worked closely with other counselors as a team to ensure camp activities ran smoothly

piano.title: Piano Studies
piano.desc:
• Classical instruction from 2003–2009
  • Jazz instruction beginning in 2012
  • Performed recitals at Senior Living Centers as community service, 2008–2009

harmo.title: Harmonic Motion
harmo.subtitle: Beatboxer and bass singer
harmo.desc: “Brown & <abbr title='Rhode Island School of Design'>RISD</abbr>'s Hottest A Cappella Group.&#8221 Performances on campus throughout the academic year.
